channel.title: Whonix workstation issue - corrupt vmdk
channel.description:
I have whonix installed on a windows 7 guest. I didn't shutdown the vm properly a few times and the vmdk is nowbroken, how can I fix it, here isa screenshot of the error.
[img]https://imageshack.com/i/po1DMSf8p[/img]

item.title: Whonix workstation issue - corrupt vmdk
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Can only be sorted out as per
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Free_Support_Principle.

Or by starting fresh, re-importing the VM image.

Read full topic
